medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate a date and/or time applying to the whole message, such as date and time of document or message issue.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify free format supplementary information and to describe totals to be loaded and/or discharged for certain general goods descriptions.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free format supplementary information and to specify the type of cargo by a general goods description, such as: - Change information - Additional instructions - Description of goods - general description.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify total measurements, other than dimensions, applicable to the specified general description of goods, such as: - Gross measurement or cube - Gross weight.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units relating to the specified general description of goods.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to specify a reference relating to the whole message, and its date and/or time.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to provide a reference relating to the whole message, such as: - reference to previous message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and/or time related to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify a name and address of a party, such as: - message sender - message recipient - ordering customer/principal - ordering customer agent

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department for the party, such as: - information contact

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom information should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to specify details for the arriving means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to identify the transport details of the arriving vessel, such as voyage number or indication of sea transport for the arriving means of transport at arrival (so, the discharge voyage number).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time related to the arrival and departure of the means of transport, such as estimated date and time of arrival and departure.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a relevant reference number, such as: - Customs declaration number - shipping line reference - Voyage number or indication of sea transport for arriving means of transport at departure (so, the loading voyage number).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to identify locations related to the transport details.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify locations related to the transport details, such as: - previous port of call - next port of call - place/port of discharge - place of berth - destination sailing area

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify date(s) and time(s) related to a location.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions related to the arriving means of transport: - Water displacement dimensions (width and/or length and/or draught of vessel).

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary information related to the means of transport, such as: - additional remarks related to the transport - remarks

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to specify total numbers.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the planned number of operations on equipment for the arriving vessel.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary information related to the planned number of operations on equipment.
